Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the interval starting with Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and ending with the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include a successful reviewer agreement
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Declined when no subsequent SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Elapsed time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to the final decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision) in each variant containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers when a new reviewer assignment follows the reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time for the segment starting at Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and ending at the next Manuscript Export Succeeded, if present in the variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in revision-involved variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time it takes from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 until SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation is reached
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average waiting time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to the next actionable reviewer-related activity (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to Assign a Different Editor when reviewer recruitment fails repeatedly
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the subsequent Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1, if any, indicating cyclical reminder behavior
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
